user.description:
Precision controls the number of decimal digits in the output.
If the time window is not 0, the sensor's value is a time weighted moving average of derivatives within the window.
The derivative will be scaled according to the selected metric prefix and time unit of the derivative.
user.title: New Derivative sensor

options.description:
Precision controls the number of decimal digits in the output.
If the time window is not 0, the sensor's value is a time weighted moving average of derivatives within the window.
The derivative will be scaled according to the selected metric prefix and time unit of the derivative.
